alert.note: Alert for Boyd; Holt (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 4:50PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...Thunderstorms with very heavy rainfall will impact portions of northern Holt and southeastern Boyd Counties through 530 PM CDT... At 449 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 11 miles east of Lynch to 11 miles northeast of Atkinson. Movement was northeast at 75 mph. HAZARD...Very heavy rainfall, winds in excess of 40 mph, and possibly small hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Atkinson, Lynch, Bristow, Monowi, Spencer Dam, Midway, Dorsey, Scottville, Redbird State Wildlife Management Area and Anncar. This includes the following highways... Highway 20 between mile markers 288 and 290. Highway 281 between mile markers 193 and 210. Highway 12 between mile markers 128 and 144. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
